name: Music visualizer (Lamaxelle)
description:
Sit and relax on Oban Star Racers soundtracks inside a Jukebox in a dreamy environnemen with this little music vizualizer.

This project was made to train myself on shaders and was inspired by VR Chat rooms.

Controls :

- You can use ZQSD/WASD to move your character

- Drag the buttons on both sides of the Jukebox to change the musical notes' distance and the sound level

- Clic on the buttons in the middle of the jukebox to pause, or play another song.

Bonus : I added the 3D files I made on blender, my scripts and my shaders if you want to use them.

Enjoy ! (๑ↀᆺↀ๑)
